column4: is there someone smart who can explain to a newbie how the firewall system works on (ed)ubuntu>? :o  got firestarter working, but i want it to auto-start...
i can make stuff auto-start, but it prompts me for the admin password
and teh entire point of it is that it works when i am not here...  ^ ^
The firewall is always up...  You only use the manager to change the settings
